column4: Does anyone know how can I reset the root-pass cause when I installed breezy on my amd64 it didn't ask any pass for root
but normally you don't need to log in as root. When you need to do administrative stuffs, just append "sudo" before the command, such as "sudo rm -rf /". That's the ubuntu way (tm)
I just installed only the base-system cause I can't start x with my pci-express gpu
